title: Fmr World Bank Chief Economist: Trump Doesn’t Believe in Fed Independence
description: Paul Romer, Nobel laureate, former World Bank chief economist, and Boston College professor, says Donald Trump does not believe in central bank independence. Speaking with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on The Close, Romer says it is entirely possible Trump could move to impose wage and price controls. (Source: Bloomberg)
